name: Paspa and the Capybara Caper
description:
Paspa & the Capybara Caper

Paspa and the Capybara Caper is a 2D platformer game where you play as Capy the capybara to collect all the Paspa, plant collectibles! The game is currently made up of 3 unique levels where you are tasked with finding all 5 plant collectibles before you proceed to the next level. 

Video Game Demo Sprite Designs Background Designs

             

Versions of the Game

If you would like to see the various versions of the game (original demo, prototype, and final version), please check out my GitHub for the different links!

Artist: Nicholas Cappelloni

Background Music: COTTAGECORE by lindseysewell  Link

Sounds: All found on mixkit.co

  • Jumping Sound: "Quick jump arcade game"
  • Item Collection Sound: "Bonus earned in video game"
  • Passed Level Sound: "Game flute bonus"

Font: Google Odibee Sans Link 

Code References: Build a 2D Platformer Game in Unity series by Coding in Flow
